verses.name: John 12:9
verses.text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there: and they came not for Jesus’ sake only, but that they might see Lazarus also, whom he had raised from the dead.

verses.name: John 12:10
verses.text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death;

verses.name: John 12:11
verses.text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away, and believed on Jesus.

verses.name: John 12:12
verses.text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast, when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem,
